meanings.definition: A small metal or plastic clip used to secure hair in place.
meanings.sent1: She used a harpins to keep her hair tidy.
meanings.sent2: The harpins held her bun in place all day.
meanings.sent3: Finding a lost harpins in her hair always made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her harpins was like a tiny guardian protecting her hairstyle.
meanings.sent5: The shiny harpins gleamed in her hair under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of protein found in plants that can induce defense responses against pathogens.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the role of harpins in plant immunity.
meanings.sent2: The harpins in the plant help fight off harmful invaders.
meanings.sent3: The harpins protein in the plant was like a superhero against germs.
meanings.sent4: The harpins acted as a shield, protecting the plant from diseases.
meanings.sent5: The harpins protein worked tirelessly to keep the plant healthy.

meanings.definition: A type of musical instrument with strings that are plucked or strummed.
meanings.sent1: She learned to play the harpins beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The sound of the harpins filled the room with melody.
meanings.sent3: His clumsy attempt at playing the harpins made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The harpins sang like a bird in the hands of the skilled musician.
meanings.sent5: The gentle notes of the harpins soothed her soul.
